original_text: And they were seeking to arrest him but feared the people, for they perceived that he had told the parable against them. So they left him and went away.
korean_text: 그들이 예수의 이 비유가 자기들을 가리켜 말씀하심인 줄 알고 잡고자 하되 무리를 두려워하여 예수를 두고 가니라

sentences.original_text: And they were seeking to arrest him
for they perceived that he had told the parable against them
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 그 비유를 자기들에게 했다고 깨달았기 때문이다
